text: "Country House" is a 1995 song by Blur. It is the leading single from their fourth studio album The Great Escape. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Iceland and Scotland, number 10 in Sweden, number 30 in New Zealand, number 4 in Finland, number 28 in Australia and number 7 in Denmark. ==Track listings== All music was composed by Albarn, Coxon, James and Rowntree. All lyrics were written by Albarn. * UK CD1 and Australian CD single # "Country House" – 3:58 # "One Born Every Minute" – 2:18 # "To the End" (with Françoise Hardy) – 5:06 * UK CD2 # "Country House" – 5:01 # "Girls & Boys" – 5:08 # "Parklife" – 4:13 # "For Tomorrow" – 7:35 Note: All tracks were recorded live at the Mile End Stadium in London, England, on 17 June 1995 * UK 7-inch and cassette single; European CD single # "Country House" – 3:58 # "One Born Every Minute" – 2:18 * Japanese CD single # "Country House" – 3:58 # "One Born Every Minute" – 2:18 # "To the End" (with Françoise Hardy) – 5:06 # "Charmless Man" – 3:44 ==References== Category:1995 songs Category:Blur (band) songs
title: Country House (song)
